page.title: 11Arlington Reservoir: supply
page.content: The Reservoir was opened in 1971. Approximate volume when full is 750 million gallons. Water is extracted from the Cuckmere River. Following storage in the Reservoir, water is treated in Arlington Treatment Works, approximately 5 million gallons per day. Treatment at the works is fairly sophisticated. It includes removal of solids, filtration and sterilisation using chlorine. Regular sampling is carried out to check that the water is of adequate quality. The water is then pumped to Folkington treated water reservoir at night. During the day it gravitates to its distribution system to supply parts of Eastbourne, Heathfield, the whole of Hailsham, and sometimes Bexhill.
